name: Sacred Grove - Doodle the Flag
description:
Here is an alternate, remotely controllable version of Sacred Grove

Have fun finding out what happens while you are playing!

CREDITS

Tech

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe. Supervised by: Prof. Florian Berger "Reach Out And Touch Fate"  (WinterSemester 2021/22)
